entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
